export default function getDate(){var date=new Date();var hours=date.getHours();var minutes=date.getMinutes();var ampm=hours>=12?"pm":"am";hours=hours%12;hours=hours?hours:12;// the hour '0' should be '12'
minutes=minutes<10?"0"+minutes:minutes;var strTime=hours+":"+minutes+" "+ampm;return strTime;}
